nodes.text: Siniteen were hyperintelligent humanoids, capable of calculating hyperspace jumps without the assistance of a navicomputer.
They had pale skin and pupilless eyes. A notable feature of this species were their hairless, oversized heads, which resembled the lobes of a brain.

During the Clone Wars, one Siniteen, Bric, was assigned to train clone trooper cadets on Kamino; another, named Brainee, was an associate of the Rodian bounty hunter Greedo; and a third, Hal'Sted, was a criminal on the planet of Rattatak. Pons Limbic frequented Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina and was present when Ben Kenobi and Luke Skywalker hired Han Solo and Chewbacca in 0 BBY.
According to the episode guide for "Clone Cadets," "Siniteen" is an anagram of "Einstein."
